720749f-b.title: Manhattan: Lafayette Street - Worth Street
720749f-b.text:
(1)
Lafayette Street, west side, north from but not including Worth
(left, not shown) to and including Leonard (right) Streets, showing the
New York Life Insurance Co. Building, between Catherine Lane and Leonard
Street. The excavation in the foreground, on the east side of Lafayette
Street, is for the new Department of Health Building.
March 27, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, showing also the north side of Leonard Street extending west
to Broadway.
March 27, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
720749f-b.folder: Lafayette Street & Worth Street, Manhattan, NY

720749f-a.text:
(1)

720749f-a.folder: Lafayette Street & Worth Street, Manhattan, NY

724842f-b.title: Manhattan: Worth Street - Lafayette Street
724842f-b.text:
(1)
Worth Street, west from and including Lafayette Street. Also
shown is Lafayette Street, at and adjoining the S.W. corner of Worth
Street. Note subway entrances on Lafayette Street.
March 27, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a different angle. Note excavation for the new
Dept. of Health Euilding, in the foreground.
March 27, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
724842f-b.folder: Worth Street & Lafayette Street, Manhattan, NY

724842f-a.title: Manhattan: Worth Street - Lafayette Street
724842f-a.text:
(1)

(2)

March 27, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
724842f-a.folder: Worth Street & Lafayette Street, Manhattan, NY

724843f-c.title: Manhattan: Worth Street - Lafayette Street
724843f-c.text:
(1)
Worth Street (foreground, where construction work is in progress),
north side, between Lafayette (left) and Centre (right) Streets, showing
a view of construction work in progress on the new Building for the
Department of Health, Hospitals and Sanitation. Directly north of same
is the Tombs Prison. Also shown is a general view northward on Centre
and Lafayette Streets from the Municipal Building. A portion of the
New York State Office Building is visible in the right foreground,
situated on the east side of Centre Street, from Worth to Leonard Streets.
May 3, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, at a later date, showing an extensive view northward, with
the mid--town Manhattan skyline in the background.
June 23, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same as view No. 2, at a later date, showing the Department of
Health Building in its completed form.
August 21, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
724843f-c.folder: Worth Street & Lafayette Street, Manhattan, NY

724841f-a.title: Manhattan: Worth Street - Lafayette Street
724841f-a.text:
Worth Street, north side, east from and across iafayette Street,
showing the Board of Health and the New York State Bldg. on opposite
sides of Centre Street. These two structures form the northly side
of an open area surrounded by civic structures and called Foley Square
in honor of a Tammany Sachem "Tim Foley".
June 12, 1938
P. L. Sperr
724841f-a.folder: Worth Street & Lafayette Street, Manhattan, NY

720739f-a.title: Manhattan: Lafayette Place - Worth Street
720739f-a.folder: Lafayette Place & Worth Street, Manhattan, NY

724840f-a.title: Manhattan: Worth Street - Lafayette Street
724840f-a.text:
Worth Street, north side, from Lafayette to Centre Streets. These
buildings will be razed to provide a site for the new Dept. of Health Building.
September 24, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
724840f-a.folder: Worth Street & Lafayette Street, Manhattan, NY
